text: Aur jab musa (alh-e-salam) humaray waqt per aaye aur unn kay rab ney unn say baaten kin to arz kiya kay aey meray perwerdigar! Apna deedar mujh ko kera dijiye kay mein aik nazar aap ko dekh loon irshad hua kay tum mujh ko hergiz nahi dekh saktay lekin tum iss pahar ki taraf dekhtay raho woh agar apni jagah per bar qarar raha to tum bhi mujhay dekh sako gay. Pus jab unn kay rab ney pahar per tajalli farmaee to tajalli ney uss kay purkhachay ura diye aur musa (alh-e-salam) bey hosh ho ker girr paray. Phir jab hosh mein aaye to arz kiya be-shak aap ki zaat pak hai mein aap ki janab mein tauba kerta hun aur mein sab say pehlay aap per eman laney wala hun
